mapper.select: SELECT tc.id, tc.table_name, tc.table_type, tc.table_prefix, tc.schema_name, tc.business_name AS tc_business_name, tc.module_name, tc.package_name, tc.author, tc.generate_path, tc.options, tfc.table_config_id, tfc.column_name, tfc.business_name AS tfc_business_name, tfc.column_type, tfc.column_comment, tfc.column_length, tfc.java_type, tfc.java_field_name, tfc.is_unique, tfc.is_nullable, tfc.is_list_visible, tfc.is_add_visible, tfc.is_edit_visible, tfc.is_detail_visible, tfc.is_query_field, tfc.query_type, tfc.form_component_type, tfc.associated_dict_type, tfc.associated_type, tfc.associated_table, tfc.associated_table_field, tfc.sort, tfc.validation_rules FROM sys_table_config tc LEFT JOIN sys_table_field_config tfc ON tfc.table_config_id = tc.id AND tfc.del_flag = false WHERE tc.id = #{id} AND tc.del_flag = false
SELECT COUNT(TABLE_NAME) FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=#{schemaName} AND TABLE_NAME=#{tableName}
SELECT TABLE_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=#{schemaName}

SELECT COLUMN_NAME AS columnName, DATA_TYPE AS columnType, COLUMN_COMMENT AS columnComment, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS charLength, NUMERIC_PRECISION AS numberLength, IF(IS_NULLABLE = 'YES', true, false) AS isNullable FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=#{schemaName} AND TABLE_NAME=#{tableName} AND COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('id','parent_id','parent_ids','level','create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')

SELECT COLUMN_NAME AS columnName, DATA_TYPE AS columnType, COLUMN_COMMENT AS columnComment, CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH AS charLength, NUMERIC_PRECISION AS numberLength, IF(IS_NULLABLE = 'YES', true, false) AS isNullable FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA=#{schemaName} AND TABLE_NAME=#{tableName} AND COLUMN_NAME=#{columnName}
mapper.insert:
CREATE TABLE `#{request.tableName}`( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT COMMENT '主键',
`#{field.columnName}` #{field.type}(#{field.length}) not null COMMENT '#{field.comment}',
`parent_id` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '父节点ID', `parent_ids` varchar(2000) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '父节点联集', `level` bigint(2) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '层级深度', `sort` smallint(6) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '排序',
PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8 COMMENT= '#{request.comment}';
mapper.sql: `create_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建时间', `create_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '创建人', `update_date` datetime DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改时间', `update_by` bigint(20) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '修改人', `remarks` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '备注', `del_flag` tinyint(4) DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '删除标记',
mapper.select:
SELECT t.COLUMN_NAME AS columnName, upper(t.DATA_TYPE) AS type, t.COLUMN_COMMENT AS comment, IF(t.IS_NULLABLE = 'NO', true, false) AS isNullable, t.ORDINAL_POSITION AS ordinalPosition, t.COLUMN_KEY AS columnKey, t.EXTRA AS extra, CASE WHEN t.DATA_TYPE IN ('text', 'tinytext', 'mediumtext', 'longtext', 'json', 'blob', 'mediumblob', 'longblob') THEN 0 WHEN t.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH IS NOT NULL THEN t.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH WHEN t.NUMERIC_PRECISION IS NOT NULL THEN t.NUMERIC_PRECISION ELSE 0 END as length FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS t WHERE t.TABLE_SCHEMA = #{request.schemaName} AND t.TABLE_NAME = #{request.tableName}
t.COLUMN_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{request.columnName},'%')
AND t.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('id','create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')
AND t.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN ('id','parent_id','parent_ids','level','sort','create_date','create_by','update_date','update_by','remarks','del_flag')
AND t.COLUMN_NAME != 'id'
mapper.update: ALTER TABLE ${request.tableName} ADD ${request.columnName} ${request.type} (${request.length}) not Null COMMENT '${request.comment}';
ALTER TABLE ${request.tableName} modify ${request.columnName} ${request.type}(${request.length}) not Null COMMENT '${request.comment}';
ALTER TABLE ${request.tableName} CHANGE ${request.oldName} ${request.columnName} ${request.type}(${request.length}) not Null COMMENT '${request.comment}';
